txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Coarse skin from the beasts to the west of Esteldín. Deliver the items to Ferrif within Esteldín.
'We will find a use for these items. Thank you.'
'Thin leather can be used to patch clothing, shoes, or packs. Coarse skin can be turned into that leather.'
Rangers of Esteldín Task: Coarse Skin
Ferrif, a Ranger, has asked for a collection of coarse skin to be delivered to him at the Ranger's home at Esteldín.
Deliver the coarse skin to Ferrif in Esteldín
You have accepted a task to collect coarse skin from the beasts in the area surrounding Esteldín to the west. Once collected, you are to deliver the items to Frerrif within Esteldín.
Wanted: Coarse skin from the beasts to the west of Esteldín.
